name: Cyber Lord's Mayhem
description:
Introduction:

Hello everyone! This game is my entry for the "Berrytastic RPG Maker Crossover Challenge" game jam held by Berry! The game will have references and some characters from other devs and games within the RPG maker community where I reside. I hope you enjoy it! 

Cyber Lord's Mayhem is a Battle-Based game with Visual Novel Styled storytelling. Select 3 Hunters and fight your way into victory, and overcome Hard, Challenging and Strategic enemies and boss battles.

Story:

Set in the Year 275 A.XW. (After Xerian War) in the Galaxy of Xerxes. A few decades after the events of "Rave Heart". Lord Terence Soren from Planet Vergal of Sector 2, has decided to conduct beta testing for the Simulation that he has been designing for many years. The Cyber Lord's lair is a unique Cyber Zone that simulates many different realities, allowing different warriors around the galaxy to fight in simulated battles. The warriors who are brave enough to participate in this dangerous beta testing are called "Hunters". In this world, you awaken as a Tactician with no memories. You are tasked to lead these Hunters into victory within the Cyber Lord's Lair, and claim your rewards! Whether they are AION (Money),  Badges,  Fame,  or Honor.

Features:

- Animated Side-View Battles
- Fast-Paced Conditional Turn-Based Battles
- Noobish Custom Arts and Artwork Edits made mostly by me (Some with the aid of the talented people in the credits)
- Challenging and Strategic Battles to overcome
- Replayability
- Unique endings
- Fun Characters and Boss Battles taken from other RPG Maker Games (Namely; Perseverance: Full Clearance, Rave Heart, and Whimsical Misadventures of Cinderella)
- Visual Novel Styled storytelling
